page.title: 03Community Centre.
page.content: The{Community Centre}is a public recreation centre.It is used for sports of all kinds for example, squash,badminton,bowling,skittles and netball.The kitchen is used for a waiting room for the{doctors surgery. A doctor from St.Just clinic comes to Sennen every Tuesday and Thursday at 2.00p.m. It is used for clubs such as the bowling club,badminton club and the W.I. It is used for discos and dances. There is a bar upstairs. The school uses the main hall for P.E.They also use it for jumble sales and fetes. The{Community Association}is also responsible for the adventure play- ground which is used by the children of the Sennen School and by the general public.The Centre,the school and the playground are situated conveniently close together.
